page.title: 20EVENTS OF 1985 -HEADLINES
page.content:
PUBLIC CEREMONIES: JANUARY 5. GEORGE PANATELLI DIVED INTO SEA TO RETRIEVE CROSS USED IN GREEK CEREMONY OF BLESSINGTHE SEA. JULY. MARGATE CARNIVAL PARADE.
WEATHER: JANUARY 8. 8 INCHES OF SNOW FELL,FORCE 9 GALES,SEVERE FROSTS.SCHOOLS CLOSED.MILK DELIVERED BY SLEDGE. JUNE. SEVERE THUNDERSTORM, SEVERAL PLACES STRUCK BY LIGHTNING,ONE HOUSE DESTROYED BY THUNDERBOLT.
TROUBLES: ARSONIST SET FIRE TO SEVERAL BUILDINGS. 70 YOUTHS FOUGHT AND CAUSED DISTURBANCES ALONG SEAFRONT ON WHITSUN BANK HOLIDAY. FACTORY CLOSES AND 120 JOBS LOST.
